term.title: branch (side chain, pendant chain)

item.text: An oligomeric or polymeric offshoot from a macromolecular chain.

notes.item: An oligomeric branch may be termed a short-chain branch.
A polymeric branch may be termed a long-chain branch.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2287. 'Glossary of basic terms in polymer science (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2297 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122287)
